mapper.update: MERGE INTO TB_LA_IS_MM_USR S USING (select na_bzplc , usrid , usrnm , mpno from tb_la_is_mm_usr where usrid = #{usrid} and usrnm = #{usrnm} and mpno = #{mpno}) T ON (S.na_bzplc = T.na_bzplc AND S.usrid = T.usrid AND S.usrnm = T.usrnm AND S.mpno = T.mpno) WHEN MATCHED THEN UPDATE SET S.ATTC_NO = #{pw}
mapper.select: SELECT NA_BZPLC , USRID , USRNM , MPNO FROM TB_LA_IS_MM_USR WHERE USRID = #{usrid} AND ATTC_NO = #{attc_no} AND ROWNUM = 1
